name: Jaws
description: A hulking figure clad in reinforced plating from head to toe. His face is obscured by a helmet with retractable fangs protruding when he speaks or prepares for combat. The armor's dull grey finish reflects the neon glow of Zenith-9 like liquid metal.

personality.voice: Deep and guttural with a hint of street slang.
personality.agenda: Follow the orders of Black Lotus Syndicate without question. Eliminate anyone who threatens their operations or leadership.
personality.background: Recruited from the slums as an orphan, he was subjected to experimental cybernetic enhancements and combat training before being deployed onto the streets.

flavor.rationale: Jaws was recruited from the streets to act as a bodyguard and enforcer for the Black Lotus Syndicate, specifically targeting rival gangs encroaching on their territory. He's deployed wherever they expect trouble.
